ygData.subject: Cantera workshop at Berkeley
ygData.msgSnippet: I am planning to hold a Cantera workshop at UC Berkeley on Thursday, Oct. 13.   Like the workshop last week at Caltech, this will be an informal, hands-on

Subject: Cantera workshop at Berkeley

I am planning to hold a Cantera workshop at UC Berkeley on Thursday, 
Oct. 13.   Like the workshop last week at Caltech, this will be an 
informal, hands-on demonstration of aspects of Cantera.  We will start 
out in the morning with basic use of Cantera in MATLAB and Python, 
demonstration of using MixMaster, working with CTI files, etc., and 
progress to more advanced features in the afternoon, depending on the 
interests of the group (C++ programming with Cantera, porting legacy 
Fortran codes...).

If you are in the Bay Area and are interested in attending, please send 
an email message to Linda Miranda (lmiranda@...) to reserve a 
spot. Also, please indicate any special topics you'd like to see 
covered.

Dave
